column4: anyone know it there is a way to add CDFS filesystem to gparted in ubuntu  ?
it might be that gparted is designed not to work on CDFS because it's a read-only system
are you trying to make an image of the CD, or...?  (you can use 'dd' for that, probably)

i think you probably need to "rip" the CDFS as an ISO or similar format, then copy that file to the USB flash ... not sure if it's possible to transfer the CDFS directly, as it's a weird format, unlike most PC disk formsts
your old faithful there kind illustrates how little of significance has changed in computing technology in 9 years, eh?  :-D
indeed :P (It has no cooling fan, no cd drive, no screen(Broke off) and usb1.0 ! ) but it runs
